dive.title: Dive Into Mathematics
dive.message: Search results will appear as you type. You can easily navigate using arrow keys and pressing Enter, or simply using your mouse or track pad.

settings.title: Make yourself at home :-)
settings.message: For the more artful, we created a subtler - dark version of the platform. You can also set the definition font to Times New Roman found in most books.

contribute.title: Create content
contribute.message: A Google Account. That is all you need to use OpenMaths to generate content and contribute.

contributeAlpha.title: This is an ALPHA version of OpenMaths
contributeAlpha.message: Feel free to play around, but bear in mind that we are currently in ALPHA and do not allow unverified users to contribute content.

manageBoard.title: Manage your board
manageBoard.message: Use the plus and minus indicators to manage rows and columns. We remember your preferences by default, but you can always disable it.

resizeBoard.title: Resize and adapt
resizeBoard.message: Feel free to play around with the grid! Whether you are running out of space, or you simply want to customise the way it looks.

formalContent.title: Semantic Awareness
formalContent.message: Be aware of the grammar, correctness and semantic relationships of mathematics.
